overview:
Tobias Christen has over 20 years’ experience in software and IT product development. In early 2008 Tobias joined DSwiss as CTO from Zurich Financial Services where he had worked for several years to build up a new security architecture and develop their IT risk strategy.

He began his career at UBS in a research team specialising in new internet technologies before leaving to join a leading international security-software company - Stonesoft - where he held the positions of Head of Research and Development, Head of Product Management, and CTO. Tobias has a PhD degree in Computer Science from the Swiss Federal Institute of Technology in Zurich, and is co-founder of the “OpenSecurityArchitecture.org” online community.
